answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.In fatty liver there is fat in the liver, along with inflammation and damage. Fatty liver due to alcoholism is called Alcoholic fatty liver disease and the other one is Nonalcoholic fatty liver disease, which is due to obesity, diabetes and high triglyceride levels. Lifestyle changes, avoiding alcohol and weight reduction can help. Consult your doctor for more queries and assistance since he knows your medical history best. I hope it helps.Best wishes and kind regards!

question: is it possible to have liver inflammation but normal liver enzymes?i have fatty liver or nash. i have pain in right quadrant but my enzymes returned to normal range.if the pain is from liver inflammation, then is it possible to have normal liver enzymes?
title: is it possible to have liver inflammation but normal liver enzymes?
